wdc_io module¶

Created on Tue Feb 16 17:46:51 2016

@author: Grace

wdc_io.angles_to_geographic(data)[source]¶

Use the declination and horizontal intensity to calculate X and Y

wdc_io.daily_mean_conversion(df)[source]¶

Calculate the daily mean using the tabular base

wdc_io.data_resampling(df, sampling='M')[source]¶

Resample the daily data to a specified frequency. Default is ‘M’ (month end) for monthly means. Another useful option is ‘A’ (year end) for annual means.
